entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.6
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • feat: improved clip behavior by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1712

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.5...v3.0.6

entry.title: New release for RecipeSage: v3.0.9
entry.content:
What's Changed

  • fix(l10n): translations update from weblate.recipesage.com by @recipesage-weblate in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1722
  • chore(deps): bump the sentry group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1719
  • chore(deps-dev): bump the eslint group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1716
  • chore(deps): bump the aws group with 3 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1718
  • chore(deps): bump @ionic/angular from 8.6.0 to 8.6.2 in the ionic group by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1720
  • fix: gsi sign in button centering, ws reconnect interval by @julianpoy in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1723
  • chore(deps): bump the trpc group with 2 updates by @dependabot in https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/pull/1717

Full Changelog: https://github.com/julianpoy/RecipeSage/compare/v3.0.8...v3.0.9
